screens.title: Twilio Chat App
screens.description: This is a React Native application for chatting built with Twilio and the React Native Gifted Chat library. It allows users to engage in real-time text conversations after joining the channel.

screens.title: Login Screen
screens.description: In this screen user has to enter his/her username to start the conversation.

screens.title: Dashboard
screens.description: The dashboard displays the channel available for the chat.

screens.title: Chat Screen
screens.description:
This is the Chat Screen. 
 Here the user can chat with the other user

screens.title: To-Do List
screens.description: This screen displays a list of all to-do items.

screens.title: Add To-Do Item
screens.description: This screen allows users to add a new to-do item.

screens.title: Edit To-Do Item
screens.description: This screen allows users to edit an existing to-do item.

screens.title: Weather Forecast
screens.description: This screen displays the current weather conditions and forecast for a given location.

screens.title: Search Locations
screens.description: This screen allows users to search for locations and view the current weather conditions and forecast.

screens.title: Settings
screens.description: This screen allows users to change the settings for the weather app, such as the temperature unit and the default location.

screens.title: Currency Converter
screens.description: This screen allows users to convert between different currencies.

screens.title: Currency History
screens.description: This screen displays the historical exchange rates for different currencies.

screens.title: Settings
screens.description: This screen allows users to change the settings for the currency converter app, such as the default currencies.
